message.content:
| Type | Flow | Summary | Artifacts | Pre-migration code | Post-migration code | Difficulty | Impact | References | | :- | :-: | :- | :- | :- | :- | :- | :- | :- | | New feature
qiskit.synthesis | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | New function: Quantum Shannon Decomposition
Addition of `qs_decomposition()` for arbitrary unitaries | `qs_decomposition` function | | from qiskit.synthesis import qs_decomposition
decomp = qs_decomposition(unitary) | mínimo (new functionality, no migration required) | qse (enables new synthesis capabilities) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | New feature
qiskit.providers.basic_provider | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | New module: BasicProvider and BasicSimulator
Introduces `qiskit.providers.basic_provider` as replacement for `basicaer` | `BasicProvider`
`BasicSimulator`
`BasicProviderJob` | | from qiskit.providers.basic_provider import BasicProvider
provider = BasicProvider()
backend = provider.get_backend("basic_simulator") | mínimo (new functionality, no migration required) | qse (new simulation/testing backend) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | Structural change
qiskit.providers.basic_provider | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | Migration: basicaer simulators to basic_provider
Statevector, Unitary, QASM simulators replaced by new classes | `BasicAerProvider`
`QasmSimulatorPy`
`UnitarySimulatorPy`
`StatevectorSimulatorPy` | from qiskit import BasicAer
backend = BasicAer.get_backend("qasm_simulator")
result = backend.run(qc).result() | from qiskit.providers.basic_provider import BasicProvider
backend = BasicProvider().get_backend("basic_simulator")
result = backend.run(qc).result() | baja (direct import/class replacement) | qse (affects simulation/testing flows) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | Structural change
qiskit.providers.basic_provider | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | Migration: Statevector simulator
Use `Statevector` from `qiskit.quantum_info` instead of BasicAer | `BasicAer`
`statevector_simulator` | from qiskit import BasicAer
backend = BasicAer.get_backend("statevector_simulator")
statevector = backend.run(qc).result().get_statevector() | from qiskit.quantum_info import Statevector
statevector = Statevector(qc) | baja (direct class replacement) | qse (affects statevector simulation) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | Structural change
qiskit.providers.basic_provider | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | Migration: Unitary simulator
Use `Operator` from `qiskit.quantum_info` instead of BasicAer | `BasicAer`
`unitary_simulator` | from qiskit import BasicAer
backend = BasicAer.get_backend("unitary_simulator")
result = backend.run(qc).result() | from qiskit.quantum_info import Operator
result = Operator(qc).data | baja (direct class replacement) | qse (affects unitary simulation) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | New feature
qiskit.providers.fake_provider | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | New class: GenericBackendV2
Configurable BackendV2 for local simulation/testing | `GenericBackendV2` | | from qiskit.providers.fake_provider import GenericBackendV2
backend = GenericBackendV2(num_qubits=3) | mínimo (new functionality, no migration required) | qse (enables flexible backend simulation) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | Structural change
qiskit.providers.fake_provider | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | Migration: FakeProvider and fake backends
Moved to `qiskit_ibm_runtime.fake_provider` | `FakeProvider`
`FakeSherbrooke`
other fake backends | from qiskit.providers.fake_provider import FakeProvider, FakeSherbrooke
backend1 = FakeProvider().get_backend("fake_ourense")
backend2 = FakeSherbrooke() | from qiskit_ibm_runtime.fake_provider import FakeProvider, FakeSherbrooke
backend1 = FakeProvider().get_backend("fake_ourense")
backend2 = FakeSherbrooke() | baja (import path change, requires new package) | qse (affects backend simulation/testing) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | Structural change
qiskit.providers.fake_provider | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | Migration: Special fake backends
Superseded by GenericBackendV2 | `FakeBackend5QV2`
`FakeBackendV2`
`FakeBackendV2LegacyQubitProps`
`FakeBackendSimple` | from qiskit.providers.fake_provider import FakeBackend5QV2
backend = FakeBackend5QV2() | from qiskit.providers.fake_provider import GenericBackendV2
backend = GenericBackendV2(num_qubits=5) | baja (class replacement, different backend properties) | qse (affects backend simulation/testing) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | New feature
qiskit.transpiler | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | Target interface: support for num_qubits=None
Allows flexible qubit count in Target-based simulators | `Target` | | from qiskit.transpiler import Target
target = Target(num_qubits=None) | mínimo (new functionality, no migration required) | qse (enables flexible transpiler targets) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | Dependency
symengine | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | Minimum symengine version bumped to >=0.11
Removes workarounds in ParameterExpression.is_real() | `symengine`
`ParameterExpression` | | pip install 'symengine>=0.11' | baja (dependency update, no code refactor) | se (dependency management) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | Structural change
qiskit | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | Packaging structure: qiskit-terra deprecated
Switch dependency from qiskit-terra to qiskit | `qiskit-terra`
`qiskit` | install_requires=['qiskit-terra>=0.44'] | install_requires=['qiskit>=0.44'] | baja (dependency update, no code refactor) | se (dependency management, packaging) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 | | Structural change
qiskit | 0.45.x → 0.46.0 | Environment management: Qiskit 0.46.x and 1.0.x are mutually exclusive
Must use separate virtual environments | `qiskit` package | pip install --upgrade qiskit | python -m venv qiskit_1.0
source qiskit_1.0/bin/activate
pip install qiskit>=1 | alta (requires environment recreation, not in-place upgrade) | se (environment, dependency isolation) | https://docs.quantum.ibm.com/api/qiskit/release-notes#0.46.0 |
